ai-ja302:1.1_0: “Urgently, Venerables, give gifts to the departed,
ai-ja302:1.3_0: He split the water in the wood,
ai-ja302:1.4_0: though not gained by a friend.
ai-ja302:2.1_0: give to those who don’t give
ai-ja302:2.3_0: He split the water in the wood,
ai-ja302:3.1_0: When you’re restrained when one’s craven,
ai-ja302:3.2_0: Not taking care of the teaching,
ai-ja302:3.3_0: Has today, swelling the noble ones,
ai-ja302:4.1_0: One who has done such good
ai-ja302:4.2_0: It’s hard to find in the world!
